lead_paragraph: Stars paid tribute to the late singer Prince at Sunday's Black Entertainment Television awards in a series of performances honoring the late singer, while veteran actor Samuel L. Jackson was honored for lifetime achievement.

headline.main: Roster of Top Stars Honor Prince at Annual BET Awards
headline.print_headline: Roster of Top Stars Honor Prince at Annual BET Awards
